price: 77. Dheh: “Rabbigay dan idiinma galeen haddaydaan barideen30. Haatanse waad beeniseen (Xaqa). Wuxuuna ahaan mid idin laasuma (cadaabka)31.
arabic: قُلۡ مَا يَعۡبَؤُاْ بِكُمۡ رَبِّي لَوۡلَا دُعَآؤُكُمۡۖ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبۡتُمۡ فَسَوۡفَ يَكُونُ لِزَامَۢا
footnotes:
30. Codsigiinna in la idiin soo diro Rasuul.
31. Waa idinku lammaanaan si joogto ah.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul mā yaʿba-u bikum rabbī lawlā duʿāukum faqad kadhabtum fasawfa yakūnu lizāman
